page.title: 15Local News. Page 2.
page.content: It is reported{supermarket chain Asda will soon make a bid for a prime site at Ayr racecourse. Discussing an application for an extension of late opening by two Ayr food outlets, the Provost declared Ayr was a late night disgrace with groups of{drunken youths}roaming the streets till the early hours. Pupils from Ayr schools took three of the top four places in the finals of the{Burns' Festival Verse Speaking {Competition. { 60th Ayrshire Scout Troop}based in Wellington Lane won the Â£1000 top prize in the Ayrshire Post's Project '85 community competition. Two brothers who attacked and robbed an Ayr man were sentenced to six years in a{Young Offenders' Institution.}The victim was beaten so brutally he will spend the rest of his life in hospital
